name: Renson Fabrications Ltd
description:
RENSON®'s mission is the ongoing development and manufacturing of commercial and residential natural air ventilation and solar shading products.

These products have a positive environmental impact. They have none or minimal operational costs, they can reduce exterior noise, they improve public health and the ventilators provide high quality fresh air supply.

RENSON® creates innovative concepts and products for a healthy and comfortable in-house climate by combining low energy consumption and respect for design
address:
Fairfax Units 1 - 5
Bircholt Road

Maidstone

product_images.title: Water Resistant Louvre Blade
product_images.description:
The BEST louvre blade in terms of water resistance. It is classified as HEVAC A2 with a suction velocity of 3m/s.

You will not find a better performing blade.

product_images.title: Louvres
product_images.description: We have a broad range of louvre blades to suit every situation. Whether you require them for ventilation, cladding, shading we will have a solution. They can be installed as a continuous system, in a panel or curved.

product_images.title: Acoustic Ventilation
product_images.description: The best in terms of acoustic ventilation. We offer acoustic trickle ventilators, like the Sonovent seen here, but also have a range of acoustic louvres on offer too.

product_images.title: Healthbox II
product_images.description:
Demand Control Ventilation is the best ventilation technology for helping residents combat their condensation problems and ensuring they achieve the best in terms of Indoor Air Quality.

A third of the price of MVHR, with very little maintence - the Healthbox II is the perfect alternative.
